oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Highlander Folk School: A Union School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Flyer advertising summer term, August 3 - September 13, 1942. "Labor's Part in Winning the War." Workshops include Practical Training for Union Members, Understanding the Labor Movement, Methods of Educating Your Own Members, How We Have Fun, and A Special Course in Techniques of Teaching. Includes cost and registration information. History and basic information about Highlander is printed on the last page.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Labor union members; Labor movement; Women in the labor movement; Labor laws and legislation; Unemployment insurance; Study and teaching (Residency); School field trips; Recreation; Labor economics; Labor unions--United States--History; Labor unions and education; Labor unions--Officials and employees; Fieldwork
